alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 1:16PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Putnam and east central Jasper Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 116 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Monticello, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph, up to penny sized hail and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Central Georgia Experiment Stn, Stanfordville, and Willard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Electrical appliances should not be used unless in an emergency.
